name: Office Attack
description:
The game isn't finished yet so ignore the long countdown at the beginning. 

The arrow keys on the keyboard are movement, space is shoot.

The joystick on the gamepad is used to move, button A to shoot.

Gamepad could be a little buggy and could not work at all, keyboard recommended.

The player's bullets are there but might be hard to see as they are a similar colour to the background.

The aim of the game is to get to the elevator at the end of the level (you need to touch it).
